page.title: 15LEISURE FACILITIES,CHEADLE.
page.content: IN OUR AREA THERE IS A SWIMMING POOL AND A BOWLING GREEN.THERE ARE TWO TENNIS COURTS,A FOOTBALL PITCH AND A PITCH AND PUTT COURSE. BUT TO FILL IN THE GAPS WE NEED MORE SPORTS FACILITIES SUCH AS A ROLLER RINK AND ICE SKATING RINK.THE ENTERTAINMENT IS VERY POOR INDEED,WE NEED CINEMAS AND THINGS FOR YOUNG CHILDREN SUCH AS AN INDOOR PLAYGROUND.THERE ARE NOT VERY MANY SHOPS IN OUR AREA.ALSO WE NEED A NEARER HOSPITAL.ALSO WE NEED MORE LIBRARIES AS THERE ARE ONLY ABOUT TWO IN OUR AREA. THE PROBLEM IS THAT THERE IS NOT ENOUGH MONEY FOR ALL OUR NEEDS. COMPARED TO STOCKPORT OUR AREA IS VERY POOR.
